title: Why are some skins unavailable on pbe?
body: I wanted to get dark star thresh to try it out to see if i want to buy it or not. but u cant buy it even tho its not unavailable on live so why are there a ton of skins like the new project skins that u cant get anymore?

replies.body:
We don't always test skins. We typically enable content that we're actively looking to test since we heavily rely on feedback to get things right.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
